hero.title: What Is MetaBitcoin Network
hero.description: The MetaBitcoin Network, centered on the BTC chain, can dynamically link other Bitcoin isomorphic chains, forming a scalable network. It fully solves Bitcoin's expansion issue and enables building a Bitcoin-based Web3 network for 80 billion people globally to use.

features.0: Entirely built on Bitcoin's tech and consensus, skipping the need for new inventions.
features.1: Able to hook up with mainstream UTXO chains, skipping hefty dev or new public chain launches.
features.2: It drives dynamic, limitless expansion, bearing the world's daily Web3 needs.
features.3: It can fully utilize the infrastructures of other side chains, such as layer-one smart contracts or layer-two EVMs.

comparing.description: MetaID supercharges BTC's trading flow via novel tech and architecture. It streamlines storage-verification, slashing redundancies for a speed boost. With smart resource distribution, it equalizes high-traffic node loads, banishing jams and lags. Thus, BTC can juggle more trades, handling small and large sums with ease, broadening its application and fortifying its stability.

why.title: Why is it important
why.description: Briefly speaking, MBN enables Bitcoin to...

point1.title: A Web3 world for 8 billion people can be built on Bitcoin
point1.description: Based on the trust of Bitcoin, leveraging its characteristics and potential to meet the needs of a large number of users and achieve Web3 functional innovations such as identity authentication and value exchange.

point2.title: Bitcoin and native Bitcoin assets can be atomically transferred to other side chains.
point2.description: Atomic transfer ensures the security and integrity of assets through cryptographic algorithms and smart contracts. It increases the flexibility of use, allowing the selection of a trading environment according to the characteristics of the side chain, such as a side chain with low fees, a side chain for industrial applications, etc. This promotes the development of the side chain ecosystem, brings value and liquidity, and attracts developers and users.

point1.title: Utilize existing compliant UTXO public chains
point1.description: Existing compliant UTXO public chains are the bedrock. Mature, stable, they slash costs & time. Nodes & power, ready-made. Their models, a springboard for complex apps.

point2.title: UTXO multi-chain bridge: Wrapping & Mapping
point2.description: The UTXO multi-chain asset bridge, with its Wrapping function, breaks the barriers between chains to package assets. The Mapping function establishes mappings to ensure the integrity of information and promote the smooth flow of assets.

point3.title: Rollup UTXO chain asset Mapping to BTC main chain
point3.description: Rollup operation pools UTXO chains' asset mappings to BTC main chain, boosting efficiency, easing load, ensuring info reliability via BTC's authority, and augmenting network scalability and user trust.

list.1: FB (Fractal Bitch) and its replica chains

list.0: It is a permissionless public chain.
list.1: It is isomorphic to Bitcoin, including adopting the UTXO architecture and supporting Legacy addresses, etc.
list.2: It adopts the SHA256 mining algorithm and the average computing power within 30 days is not lower than 10 ph/s.
